text: Arunoday Banerjee, known as "Rahul" (, born 16 October 1983), is a Bengali Indian male actor of films and TV. == Television== * Tumi Asbe Bole (2014 - 2016) as Rahul Deb Roy, STAR Jalsha * Swapno Udaan (2017) as Rupayan Sen, STAR Jalsha *Ardhangini (2018-Present ) as Umapati STAR Jalsha ==References== Category:Indian television actors
title: Rahul Banerjee
